turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey can you help me order some pizzas from Papa Johns?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, the one near us?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes of course.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What do you want to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: We'll do that 2 large pizza special with them, one pepperoni and one chicken bbq.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Anything else with that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah let's get two orders of bread sticks, one 2 liter bottle of coke and one 2 liter bottle of coke zero.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK great, let me find out the total for all of that.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It's going to come to $31.24 for everything, will this be for pickup?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah pick up.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They will be ready for pickup in 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: OK.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: How do you want to pay?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll use my credit card, they should have it on file.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK done. They will send a receipt to your phone and the pizzas will be ready in 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you, can you go pick it up yourself?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes of course.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Awesome, thanks! See you in a bit.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: See you.
